name: The North Face Jr Hedgehog Hiker II Mid WP - Youths
categories: Jr Hedgehog Hiker II Mid WP
description: Durable, grippy and waterproof, the Jr Hedgehog Hiker II Mid is up for next-level exploring. The HydroSeal® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfy when rain breaks out on the trail. Grippy soles and a secure fit let kids scramble across rugged terrain with ease.Synthetic upper with suede overlays for structure.HydroSeal® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfortable.Gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Single-pull closure option to get going faster.Reinforced toecap adds durability and toe protection.Removable OrthoLite® footbed for underfoot comfort.Dynalyte™ EVA midsole for shock absorption and cushioning.Reinforced heel with pull strap.Non-marking rubber outsole sticks to whatever the trail throws at you.
